name: The Shape of Us
storyline:
Based on the monomyth of the Hero’s Journey and inspired by indigenous ceremony design, The Shape Of Us offers a deep dive into our assumptions and attitudes towards our role as humans on Planet Earth. Its main game mechanics are body motion and interactive storytelling as well as conscious moments of intention setting and stillness.

The players are guided through the wastelands of human civilization, ventured into the Unknown and rewarded with a sense of one-ness and community. A mindful Onboarding and Offboarding leading in and out of the journey can be downloaded for free on the website as well as a variety of educational content for teachers and workshop hosts in the fields of VR and climate psychology: 

Our intention is to nurture a healthy relationship between humans, non-humans and technology, to foster synergies between art, education, game design and embodied practices (such as Gestalt Therapy or Somatic Experiencing), and ultimately to inspire the players to (re)connect and listen to their inner wisdom.
summary: A VR journey that brings you closer to Nature. You’ll use your whole body on the way – prepare to stretch, crawl, rest, dance, feel!
